Can I use my Logitech joystick with KSP?

Thanks! :D
It should. Plug it in (BEFORE you start KSP) and find out! You'll need to go to Settings in the main menu and map axes and buttons before you can do anything with it, though.

[quote name='pincushionman']It should. Plug it in (BEFORE you start KSP) and find out! You'll need to go to Settings in the main menu and map axes and buttons before you can do anything with it, though.[/QUOTE]
Okay, thanks! I will try it out! :D

KSP can be controlled with any joystick. If it doesn't work natively just configure vJoy and FreePIE, details [url=http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24877-Tutorial-Joystick-settings-for-PPjoy-and-GlovePie-Originally-by-Bedazzled]here[/url] (second post).
Heck, I use a 3rd-party Xbox 360 controller with mine. Works like a dream!
